values.label: Send credit note
values.comment: Send a credit note.

values.label: Change invoice
values.comment: Send invoice, taking into account specified discrepancies.

values.label: Advise by airmail
values.comment: Instruction to advise party by airmail.

values.label: Advise
values.comment: Instruction to advise a party.

values.label: Read meter at beginning of supply
values.comment: Read the meter when the supply period starts.

values.label: Stop delivery process
values.comment: Instruction to cease delivery.

values.label: Send replacement
values.comment: The identified item must be sent for replacement.

values.label: Pick-up
values.comment: The identified item is to be picked up.

values.label: Advise by telecommunication
values.comment: Advise of documentary credit by telecommunication.

values.label: Advise by fax
values.comment: Instruction to advise party by fax.

values.label: By registered airmail
values.comment: Issue documentary credit by registered airmail.

values.label: By registered airmail in one set
values.comment: Deliver documents in one set by registered airmail.

values.label: By registered airmail in two sets
values.comment: Deliver documents in two sets by registered airmail.

values.label: Authorized to debit our account when due
values.comment: The receiver is authorized to debit the account of the sender when due.

values.label: Authorized to reimburse yourselves on the reimbursing bank when due
values.comment: The receiver is authorized to reimburse themselves on the reimbursing bank when due.

values.label: Advise by phone
values.comment: Instruction to advise party by phone.

values.label: Upon receipt and verification of documents we shall credit your account with us when due
values.comment: Upon receipt and verification of documents we shall credit your account with us when due.

values.label: Protest non-payment
values.comment: Protest is to be made in case of non-payment.

values.label: Protest non-acceptance
values.comment: Protest is to be made in case of non-acceptance.

values.label: Advise by telex
values.comment: Instruction to advise party by telex.

values.label: Protest non-acceptance and non-payment
values.comment: Protest is to be made in case of non-acceptance and non- payment.

values.label: May not be waived
values.comment: Not permitted to be waived.

values.label: May be waived
values.comment: Permitted to be waived.

values.label: Acceptance and/or payment may be deferred until the arrival of goods
values.comment: Acceptance and/or payment may be deferred until the goods have arrived.

values.label: Acceptance and/or payment may not be deferred until the arrival of goods
values.comment: Acceptance and/or payment may not be deferred until the goods have arrived.

values.label: If documents are not honoured on arrival of goods then warehouse goods
values.comment: Goods are to be warehoused if documents are not taken up on the goods' arrival.

values.label: If documents are not honoured on arrival of goods then warehouse goods and insure against fire
values.comment: Goods are to be warehoused and insured against fire if documents are not taken up on the goods' arrival.

values.label: If documents are not honoured on arrival of goods then warehouse goods and insure against usual risks
values.comment: Goods are to be warehoused and insured against the usual risks if documents are not taken up on the goods' arrival.

values.label: Case of need party has power to give instructions
values.comment: Case of need party has the power to give instructions.

values.label: Case of need party may advise only
values.comment: The case of need party may advise only.

values.label: Draft must be returned after acceptance
values.comment: The draft must be returned after acceptance.

values.label: Advise by mail
values.comment: Instruction to advise party by mail.

values.label: Release documents against acceptance
values.comment: The documents are to be released against acceptance.

values.label: Release documents against payment
values.comment: The documents are to be released against payment.

values.label: Release documents against issuance of drawee's undertaking
values.comment: The documents are to be released against issuance of drawee's undertaking.

values.label: Release documents against issuance of presenting bank's undertaking
values.comment: The documents are to be released against issuance of presenting bank's undertaking.

values.label: Release documents against issuance of named bank's undertaking
values.comment: The documents are to be released against issuance of named bank's undertaking.

values.label: Release documents against issuance of drawee's signed promissory note
values.comment: The documents are to be released against issuance of drawee's signed promissory note.

values.label: Release documents against issuance of presenting bank's signed promissory note
values.comment: The documents are to be released against issuance of presenting bank's signed promissory note.

values.label: Release documents against issuance of named bank's signed promissory note
values.comment: The documents are to be released against issuance of named bank's signed promissory note.

values.label: Release documents against issuance of drawee's signed trust receipt
values.comment: The documents are to be released against issuance of drawee's signed trust receipt.

values.label: Release documents against acceptance and aval of presenting bank
values.comment: The documents are to be released against acceptance and aval of presenting bank.

values.label: Release documents against acceptance and aval of named bank
values.comment: The documents are to be released against acceptance and aval of named bank.

values.label: Remit proceeds
values.comment: The proceeds are to be remitted.

values.label: Remit proceeds to intermediary bank
values.comment: The proceeds are to be remitted to the intermediary bank.

values.label: Accept provisional deposit if covered in local currency
values.comment: Where the currency of the collection is not available, the collection bank is authorised to accept a provisional deposit in local currency.

values.label: Read meter at end of supply
values.comment: Read the meter when the supply period ends.

values.label: Replace if necessary
values.comment: Replace the item if necessary.

values.label: Replace
values.comment: Replace the item.

values.label: Do not replace
values.comment: Do not replace the item.

values.label: Remedial action for incorrect account number
values.comment: Instruction to take the appropriate remedial action to correct the referenced account number.

values.label: Remedial action for unknown account
values.comment: Instruction to take the appropriate remedial action because the referenced account is not known.

values.label: Remedial action for account frozen by legal authorities
values.comment: Instruction to take the appropriate remedial action because the referenced account has been frozen by legal authorities.

values.label: Remedial action for deceased account holder
values.comment: Instruction to take remedial action that is appropriate because the holder of the referenced account is dead.

values.label: Remedial action for refusal by account owner or ultimate beneficiary
values.comment: Instruction to take the appropriate remedial action because the account owner or ultimate beneficiary has refused to accept the transaction.

values.label: Remedial action for unjustified charges claim on beneficiary
values.comment: Instruction to take the appropriate remedial action because it is claimed that the charges on the beneficiary are unjustified.

values.label: Remedial action for unrecognised destination bank or branch identification
values.comment: Instruction to take the appropriate remedial action because the destination bank or branch identification is not recognised.

values.label: Remedial action for closed destination account
values.comment: Instruction to take the appropriate remedial action beause the destination account has been closed.

values.label: Remedial action for transaction over credit limit
values.comment: Instruction to take the appropriate remedial action because the transaction exceeds an agreed credit limit.

values.label: Remedial action for disallowed transaction type
values.comment: Instruction to take the appropriate remedial action because the type of transaction is not allowed.

values.label: Remedial action for insufficient funds
values.comment: Instruction to take the appropriate remedial action because of insufficient funds.

values.label: Remedial action for no prior mandate in place
values.comment: Instruction to take the appropriate remedial action because no mandate has been agreed beforehand.

values.label: Remedial action for revoked mandate
values.comment: Instruction to take the appropriate remedial action because the mandate has been revoked.

values.label: Remedial action for unknown party
values.comment: Instruction to take the appropriate remedial action because a party is unknown.

values.label: Remedial action for incorrect bank information
values.comment: Instruction to take the appropriate remedial action because the specified bank information is incorrect or invalid.

values.label: Remedial action for duplicated transaction
values.comment: Instruction to take the appropriate remedial action because a transaction has been duplicated.

values.label: Convert
values.comment: Convert the message into other format.

values.label: Remedial action for transaction not completed for a reason that cannot be disclosed
values.comment: Instructs the recipient of the returned message to take the appropriate remedial action when the transaction has been rejected for a reason that, for legal or other reasons, cannot be disclosed.

values.label: Return using only authorized transport
values.comment: The item is to be returned only using the identified authorized transport.

values.label: Return using any transport
values.comment: The item may be returned using any transport.

values.label: Send by courier services
values.comment: Send the item(s) by courier services.

values.label: Return by specified date
values.comment: The item is to be returned by the date specified.

values.label: Supplier to organize transport
values.comment: The supplier is to organize transport for the items.

values.label: Buyer to organize transport
values.comment: The buyer is to organize transport for the items.

values.label: Prepare for collection
values.comment: The items are to be prepared for collection.

values.label: Prepare for collection on specified date
values.comment: The items are to be prepared for collection on the specified date.

values.label: Specific clearing
values.comment: Item(s) are subject to specific clearing.

values.label: Without
values.comment: The bank advising the documentary credit is not requested to confirm the credit.

values.label: May add
values.comment: The bank advising the documentary credit may add its confirmation to the documentary credit.

values.label: Confirm
values.comment: The bank advising the documentary credit is requested to confirm the credit.

values.label: By registered mail
values.comment: Issue documentary credit by registered mail.

values.label: By courier service
values.comment: Issue documentary credit by courier service.

values.label: By teletransmission
values.comment: Issue documentary credit by teletransmission.

values.label: Preadvice by teletransmission
values.comment: Preadvise documentary credit by teletransmission.

values.label: By courier service in one set
values.comment: Deliver documents in one set by courier service.

values.label: By courier service in two sets
values.comment: Deliver documents in two sets by courier service.

values.label: By registered mail in one set
values.comment: Deliver documents in one set by registered mail.

values.label: By registered mail in two sets
values.comment: Deliver documents in two sets by registered mail.

values.label: Per teletransmission
values.comment: Deliver documents by teletransmission.

values.label: Advise beneficiary by phone
values.comment: Advise beneficiary of documentary credit by phone.

values.label: Late presentation of documents within documentary credit validity acceptable
values.comment: Late presentation of documents with the documentary credit validity is acceptable.

values.label: EDI
values.comment: Instructions to advise beneficiary by EDI.

values.label: Electronic mail
values.comment: Instructions to advise beneficiary by electronic mail.

values.label: Expedite
values.comment: Forward the information to requested party immediately.

values.label: Send by regular mail
values.comment: Send the tem(s) by regular mail.

values.label: Print
values.comment: Print the item(s).

values.label: Quality control held
values.comment: Goods to be held from distribution by stockholder until a quality control assessment is completed by the manufacturer.

values.label: Quality control embargo
values.comment: Quality control assessment is negative, goods are to be held from distribution by stockholder.

values.label: Released
values.comment: Goods are released by manufacturer for distribution by stockholder.

values.label: Send by registered mail
values.comment: Send the item(s) by registered mail.

values.label: S.W.I.F.T.
values.comment: Instructions to advise beneficiary by S.W.I.F.T.

values.label: Take once a day
values.comment: To be taken once daily.

values.label: Take two times a day
values.comment: To be taken two times each day.

values.label: Take three times a day
values.comment: To be taken three times each day.

values.label: Take four times a day
values.comment: To be taken four times daily.
